columns.name: Timestamp
columns.description: Date and time when the event was recorded

columns.name: DeviceId
columns.description: Unique identifier for the device in the service

columns.name: DeviceName
columns.description: Fully qualified domain name (FQDN) of the device

columns.name: ActionType
columns.description: Type of activity that triggered the event. See the in-portal schema reference for details.

columns.name: FileName
columns.description: Name of the file that the recorded action was applied to

columns.name: FolderPath
columns.description: Folder containing the file that the recorded action was applied to

columns.name: SHA1
columns.description: SHA-1 of the file that the recorded action was applied to

columns.name: SHA256
columns.description: SHA-256 of the file that the recorded action was applied to. This field is usually not populated — use the SHA1 column when available.

columns.name: MD5
columns.description: MD5 hash of the file that the recorded action was applied to

columns.name: FileSize
columns.description: Size of the file in bytes

columns.name: AccountDomain
columns.description: Domain of the account

columns.name: AccountName
columns.description: User name of the account; if the device is registered in Microsoft Entra ID, the Entra ID user name of the account might be shown instead

columns.name: AccountSid
columns.description: Security Identifier (SID) of the account

columns.name: RemoteUrl
columns.description: URL or fully qualified domain name (FQDN) that was being connected to

columns.name: RemoteDeviceName
columns.description: Name of the device that performed a remote operation on the affected device. Depending on the event being reported, this name could be a fully-qualified domain name (FQDN), a NetBIOS name, or a host name without domain information.

columns.name: ProcessId
columns.description: Process ID (PID) of the newly created process

columns.name: ProcessCommandLine
columns.description: Command line used to create the new process

columns.name: ProcessCreationTime
columns.description: Date and time the process was created

columns.name: ProcessTokenElevation
columns.description: Indicates the type of token elevation applied to the newly created process. Possible values: TokenElevationTypeLimited (restricted), TokenElevationTypeDefault (standard), and TokenElevationTypeFull (elevated)

columns.name: LogonId
columns.description: Identifier for a logon session. This identifier is unique on the same device only between restarts.

columns.name: RegistryKey
columns.description: Registry key that the recorded action was applied to

columns.name: RegistryValueName
columns.description: Name of the registry value that the recorded action was applied to

columns.name: RegistryValueData
columns.description: Data of the registry value that the recorded action was applied to

columns.name: RemoteIP
columns.description: IP address that was being connected to

columns.name: RemotePort
columns.description: TCP port on the remote device that was being connected to

columns.name: LocalIP
columns.description: IP address assigned to the local device used during communication

columns.name: LocalPort
columns.description: TCP port on the local device used during communication

columns.name: FileOriginUrl
columns.description: URL where the file was downloaded from

columns.name: FileOriginIP
columns.description: IP address where the file was downloaded from

columns.name: InitiatingProcessSHA1
columns.description: SHA-1 of the process (image file) that initiated the event

columns.name: InitiatingProcessSHA256
columns.description: SHA-256 of the process (image file) that initiated the event. This field is usually not populated — use the SHA1 column when available.

columns.name: InitiatingProcessMD5
columns.description: MD5 hash of the process (image file) that initiated the event

columns.name: InitiatingProcessFileName
columns.description: Name of the process file that initiated the event; if unavailable, the name of the process that initiated the event might be shown instead

columns.name: InitiatingProcessFileSize
columns.description: Size of the file that ran the process responsible for the event

columns.name: InitiatingProcessFolderPath
columns.description: Folder containing the process (image file) that initiated the event

columns.name: InitiatingProcessId
columns.description: Process ID (PID) of the process that initiated the event

columns.name: InitiatingProcessCommandLine
columns.description: Command line used to run the process that initiated the event

columns.name: InitiatingProcessCreationTime
columns.description: Date and time when the process that initiated the event was started

columns.name: InitiatingProcessAccountDomain
columns.description: Domain of the account that ran the process responsible for the event

columns.name: InitiatingProcessAccountName
columns.description: User name of the account that ran the process responsible for the event; if the device is registered in Microsoft Entra ID, the Entra ID user name of the account that ran the process responsible for the event might be shown instead

columns.name: InitiatingProcessAccountSid
columns.description: Security Identifier (SID) of the account that ran the process responsible for the event

columns.name: InitiatingProcessAccountUpn
columns.description: User principal name (UPN) of the account that ran the process responsible for the event; if the device is registered in Microsoft Entra ID, the Entra ID UPN of the account that ran the process responsible for the event might be shown instead

columns.name: InitiatingProcessAccountObjectId
columns.description: Microsoft Entra object ID of the user account that ran the process responsible for the event

columns.name: InitiatingProcessVersionInfoCompanyName
columns.description: Company name from the version information of the process (image file) responsible for the event

columns.name: InitiatingProcessVersionInfoProductName
columns.description: Product name from the version information of the process (image file) responsible for the event

columns.name: InitiatingProcessVersionInfoProductVersion
columns.description: Product version from the version information of the process (image file) responsible for the event

columns.name: InitiatingProcessVersionInfoInternalFileName
columns.description: Internal file name from the version information of the process (image file) responsible for the event

columns.name: InitiatingProcessVersionInfoOriginalFileName
columns.description: Original file name from the version information of the process (image file) responsible for the event

columns.name: InitiatingProcessVersionInfoFileDescription
columns.description: Description from the version information of the process (image file) responsible for the event

columns.name: InitiatingProcessParentId
columns.description: Process ID (PID) of the parent process that spawned the process responsible for the event

columns.name: InitiatingProcessParentFileName
columns.description: Name or full path of the parent process that spawned the process responsible for the event

columns.name: InitiatingProcessParentCreationTime
columns.description: Date and time when the parent of the process responsible for the event was started

columns.name: InitiatingProcessLogonId
columns.description: Identifier for a logon session of the process that initiated the event. This identifier is unique on the same device only between restarts.

columns.name: ReportId
columns.description: Event identifier based on a repeating counter. To identify unique events, this column must be used in conjunction with the DeviceName and Timestamp columns.

columns.name: AppGuardContainerId
columns.description: Identifier for the virtualized container used by Application Guard to isolate browser activity

columns.name: AdditionalFields
columns.description: Additional information about the event in JSON array format

columns.name: InitiatingProcessSessionId
columns.description: Windows session ID of the initiating process

columns.name: IsInitiatingProcessRemoteSession
columns.description: Indicates whether the initiating process was run under a remote desktop protocol (RDP) session (true) or locally (false)

columns.name: InitiatingProcessRemoteSessionDeviceName
columns.description: Device name of the remote device from which the initiating process's RDP session was initiated

columns.name: InitiatingProcessRemoteSessionIP
columns.description: IP address of the remote device from which the initiating process's RDP session was initiated

columns.name: CreatedProcessSessionId
columns.description: Windows session ID of the created process

columns.name: IsProcessRemoteSession
columns.description: Indicates whether the created process was run under a remote desktop protocol (RDP) session (true) or locally (false)

columns.name: ProcessRemoteSessionDeviceName
columns.description: Device name of the remote device from which the created process's RDP session was initiated

columns.name: ProcessRemoteSessionIP
columns.description: IP address of the remote device from which the created process's RDP session was initiated

columns.name: ProcessUniqueId
columns.description: Unique identifier of the process; this is equal to the Process Start Key in Windows devices

columns.name: InitiatingProcessUniqueId
columns.description: Unique identifier of the initiating process; this is equal to the Process Start Key in Windows devices
